channel.title: Gta Iv Cheat
channel.description: Umm... It is true the game can be damaged if i save after a cheat code?

item.title: Gta Iv Cheat
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:260680”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=344235.msg2658326#msg2658326 date=1234021927]

What do you mean? Your save will always say that you cheated, but it’s not going to actually damage anything.

no there is something rockstar have, i beleive, that if you cheat in game and save it you cannot achieve 100% even if the cheat was trivial and was used for just messing around it prevents you from accessing 100%
[/quote]

Then have a save that you cheat on, and saves that you never cheated on. It was the same on all other GTA’s as well.[/quote]
obviously, but he asked would it be damaged, the answer is no but you wont be able to get 100%. Technically its not damaged

Read full topic

item.title: Gta Iv Cheat
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

pesky:

Yeah, no matter what you do you can only get 99% lol very clever of them really

No, what moparisthebest said works fine.

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:6, topic:260680”][quote author=sanga282 link=topic=344235.msg2658326#msg2658326 date=1234021927]

What do you mean? Your save will always say that you cheated, but it’s not going to actually damage anything.

no there is something rockstar have, i beleive, that if you cheat in game and save it you cannot achieve 100% even if the cheat was trivial and was used for just messing around it prevents you from accessing 100%
[/quote]

Then have a save that you cheat on, and saves that you never cheated on. It was the same on all other GTA’s as well.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Gta Iv Cheat
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

San Andreas had this, if you used a cheat, there was a small chance that your save file would be unable to load.

item.title: Gta Iv Cheat
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“sanga282, post:3, topic:260680”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=344235.msg2657767#msg2657767 date=1233976205]
What do you mean? Your save will always say that you cheated, but it’s not going to actually damage anything.
[/quote]
no there is something rockstar have, i beleive, that if you cheat in game and save it you cannot achieve 100% even if the cheat was trivial and was used for just messing around it prevents you from accessing 100%[/quote]

Then have a save that you cheat on, and saves that you never cheated on. It was the same on all other GTA’s as well.
